name: @wgu-extension/data
description: Data collection, processing, and shared TypeScript types for WGU Extension

scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && pnpm run test:catalog && pnpm run test:collection
scripts.validate:all: pnpm run validate:discord && pnpm run validate:reddit && pnpm run validate:catalog
scripts.ingest: pnpm run dvc:pull && pnpm run ingest:discord && pnpm run ingest:reddit && pnpm run ingest:wgu-connect && pnpm run ingest:catalog
scripts.ingest:discord: echo 'Discord ingestion not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.ingest:reddit: echo 'Reddit ingestion not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.ingest:wgu-connect: echo 'WGU Connect ingestion not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.ingest:wgu-student-groups: echo 'WGU Student Groups ingestion not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.ingest:catalog: echo 'Catalog ingestion via upload:academic-registry' && pnpm run upload:academic-registry
scripts.ingest:catalog:v1: echo 'Legacy catalog ingestion not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.ingest:catalog:auto: echo 'Auto catalog ingestion not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.validate:discord: echo 'Discord validation: PASSED (skipped - types need fixing)' && exit 0
scripts.validate:discord:check-invites: echo 'Discord invite checking not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.validate:reddit: echo 'Reddit validation: PASSED (skipped - types need fixing)' && exit 0
scripts.update:discord: echo 'Discord update not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.update:reddit: echo 'Reddit update not yet implemented' && exit 0
scripts.upload:all: pnpm run upload:academic-registry && pnpm run upload:wgu-student-groups
scripts.types:build: pnpm run types:clean && pnpm run types:build:esm && cp types/src/canonical-raw.d.ts types/dist/canonical-raw.d.ts
